comments.body: I think you should remove the package in https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/hack/.staticcheck_failures
I didn't see `kubelet` related pkg there

this file is automatically kept up to date, PRs won't merge if it's not** up to date.

are you running staticcheck using the rule in the repo or with your own install? we use a specific version in CI

I see how this would fix the issue because of the one-off hack we currently have in the `TopologyManager`, i.e. where we intercept hints that have more than one NUMA affinity and force them to `false`.

However, since this is only broken on master, I'm inclined to wait for a proper fix in the form of https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/issues/83478.

What do others think?
